english_example_sentence: You meet with your old friend in the park every Friday.
russian_example_sentence: Ты встречаешься со своим старым другом в парке каждую пятницу.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen her cuma parkta eski arkadaşınla buluşuyorsun.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen her cuma parkta eski arkadaşınla ______.
